title: Congo Central Bank to Intervene to Curb Currency Speculation
description: The central bank of the Democratic Republic of Congo said it plans to continue intervening in the foreign exchange market to curb currency speculation.
content: The central bank of the Democratic Republic of Congo said it plans to continue intervening in the foreign exchange market to curb currency speculation.
